title: With a Strong-willed Marchioness, Prince Yandere’s Love Offensive - Novel Updates
tags: Broken Engagement   C*nnilingus   Cold Love Interests   Confinement   Female Protagonist   F*llatio   Misunderstandings   Proactive Protagonist   Reverse R*pe   Royalty   R*pe   Schemes And Conspiracies
author: Midori Takako   碧貴子
description:
Anies, the daughter of the Marquis, is told to end her engagement by Prince Lucilleur, her longtime unrequited love and fiancée. All while her love rival stands next to him.

If she will never be loved, if there is only a future where she will be trapped and oppressed, then at the end...

A story about a heroine who looks like a strong villainess giving up on her hero and taking some action (?) in order to gain freedom.>
